reviews.review: 永恒的经典，永远的第一FPS游戏，只是感觉v社并不上心，游戏本身很好玩
Un juego muy recomendado para aquellas personas a las que les guste el shooter en 1er persona, muy entretenido al jugar con amigos!
my 5th account and I like it

恋爱，养成，沙盒，fps，跑酷，打僵尸，rap。

This is a pretty straight forward game you can fall in love with easily. It's easy to pick up and learn the ropes. Lots of great modes to play and even more on the community servers! It's a huge plus if you have a group of friends to play with! A group which is easy to find with the abundance of modes and friendly people. Now with operation Shattered Web the game is way cooler too!

O único problema é a comunidade

Gosto da dinâmica do jogo, porem o número gigante de hackers estraga a experiência.
the game is a lot of fun and matchmaking is very skill rewarding, 10/10
Excelente juego, a pesar de los años sigue siendo mi favorito, aunque aveces tengo meses en los que no juego, siempre instalado :)
Perfecto para jugar con amigos y cagarte a puteadas

Jogo de FPS simples, sem poderes mágicos ou uma variedade de habilidades. Perfeito para estrategistas sem muito tempo de dominar mil habilidades.
I think the game is great and fun an competitive.
A quantidade de horas mostra o quanto amo esse jogo kkkk. O segredo é fazer amigos para poder jogar e se divertir tanto em competitivo quanto em casual

The game is super fun and easy to interact with other people. If you are wanting to play a good shooting game this is it. There are tons of different aspects of this game that you can play with friends and have fun.
